desc.platform: Choose the source platform of the data, which is where you get the token
desc.token: Create an API key at settings page on {{platform}} web app. It's a secret!
desc.folder: Choose the form of folder where the {{platform}} data will be stored
desc.frequency: Enter the frequency in minutes to sync automatically
desc.syncOnStartup: Check this box if you want to sync with {{platform}} when the app is loaded
desc.lastSync: Last time the plugin synced with {{platform}}. The 'Sync' command fetches articles updated after this timestamp
